summary.para: Represents a list of text values separated by a single whitespace character.
(e.g. The list { { WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_INT32 }, 123}, { { WS_XML_TEXT_TYPE_BOOL }, 1 } represents the text "123 true")

member.name: WS_XML_LIST_TEXT.text
member.summary: The base type for all types that derive from .

member.name: WS_XML_LIST_TEXT.itemCount
member.summary: The number of items in the list.
